3D Print Spool Manager

Estimate remaining meters and log usage—saved in your browser.

How to use

  1. Add or update a spool with weight and material.
  2. Log grams used per print.
  3. Watch remaining meters update.

Manage spools

Tips & gotchas

  • Weigh empty spools for accuracy.
  • Material density varies by brand.
